root.title: Story Quest For Arataki Itto Walkthrough Guide
root.p: Arataki Itto's Taurus Iracundus Story Quest is an upcoming story Quest for version 2.3 of Genshin Impact. Learn how to unlock, walkthrough chart, release date, and more about Taurus Iracundus!
root.subTitle: Arataki Itto Story Quest - How To Unlock
root.subHeader: A New Story Quest For 2.3 Update

preReq.end: Complete Chapter: Act I - "Dracaena Somnolenta Chapter"
preReq.p: Join Arataki Itto on his own story quest and get to know more of Itto's background as the descendant of the Crimson Oni. His story quest will be available permanently after the 2.3 game update.
Upon the release of the Story Quest, it's likely that it will require 1 story key to unlock it similar to previously released Story Quests.
Get Story Keys By Doing Daily Commissions
You can obtain Story Keys by doing daily commissions. You can keep a maximum amount of 3 keys.

charBio.p: A new Inazuma Geo character that wields a Claymore weapon. He is the first and considered the greatest Head of the Arataki Gang and an intrepid man with Oni blood running through his veins.

root.header: Arataki Itto Story Quest - Walkthrough Chart and Location
root.p: Arataki Itto's story quest will start off by going to the Adventurer's Guild and talking to Katheryne of Inazuma.
root.in: Talk to Katheryne in Inazuma
Talk to Furuya Noboru
Talk to Ogura Mio
Talk to Uesugi
Talk to Sango Obtain: A Bag of Beans
Go to Yashiori Island and search for Arataki Itto To Do: Use Elemental Sight and follow the foot trail
Throw beans at Arataki Itto Note: Avoid getting caught by him
Go to the Onikabuto capture shot (above the hill)
Go to a certain tree around the area and catch an Onikabuto with Itto
Go down to the cliff and go to the next tree to search for another Onikabuto
Go to a certain rock, where you will find (1) one Onikabuto
Go back near the camp and have a Bettle battle with Daisuke and Itto
Go to Fort Fujitou
Talk to Masato
Go to Nazuchi Beach
Defeat the enemies Character Trial: Arataki Itto
Defeat the Tenryou Guards Character Trial: Arataki Itto
Follow the footprints in order to chase Takuya (Blue Oni)
Search for a Hidden Hideout.
Enter the domain and defeat the enemies Event Domain: Crumbling Guilt Character Trial: Arataki Itto
Go back to Grandma Oni
root.p: After talking to Sango, she will give you A Bag of Beans that will be used in order to capture Arataki Itto. This item is only available on Arataki Itto's quest and its usage is still unknown.
